Es la segunda vez que viene solicitando un préstamo con MFP, y se siente contento de formar parte del grupo que es su banco comunal porque le han enseñado el gran valor de prevenir para el futuro. El dinero que Casimiro ahora necesita lo invertirá en la compra de fertilizantes para sus tierras de cultivo.
texts.en:
Casimiro is 60 years old and lives with his wife. He has been a farmer his entire life, having started working in agriculture as a child. While he waits for the harvest, he gets up every morning to put his cows to pasture. His wife accompanies him on the long walks to the pasture, which is 3 hours away on foot. Casimiro grows crops traditional to the region, like potatoes, corn etc. The majority of his crops are sold directly to specific vendors but he also sells a small part of his harvest himself. Casimiro and his wife would like to continue with this work until their strength fails them. Both of them are very grateful for all that life has given them and especially that their work has allowed them to care for their children, who are now grown. This is their second loan from MFP and they enjoy being part of the communal bank because it has taught them the value of planning for the future. Casimiro will use the money to buy fertilizer for his fields.

Translated from Spanish by Sara Sultan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Dionisio

texts.es: Dionisio tiene 44 años, vive con su madre anciana en su propia casa. Desde hace 20 años se dedica a la compra y venta de animales en la feria ganadera más cercana a su localidad. Sus padres le enseñaron este negocio, que hoy es el sostén económico de su casa, cada día Dionisio selecciona cuidadosamente a los animales que ha de comprar para obtener buenas ganancias y recuperar su capital. En sus inicios fue víctima de engaños cuando  le vendían animales enfermos que le generaban pérdidas, aun así, con su constancia y perseverancia logró en la actualidad las ganancias de su trabajo, y la suficiente experiencia para evitar se engañado. Su deseo a futuro es tener mayor cantidad de animales para incrementar sus ventas y ganancias. Es la segunda vez que Dionisio tiene un préstamo con MFP, él desea seguir trabajando solidariamente con su banco comunal para mejorar como persona y en su negocio. El dinero que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de más animales; como ovejas y cerdos jóvenes, de esta manera el acrecentará su capital de trabajo.
texts.en:
Dionisio is 44 years old and lives with his elderly mother in a home that he owns. For 20 years, he has bought and sold animals at a livestock market in his neighbourhood. His parents taught him this trade and it has provided for his household's needs. Every day Dionisio carefully chooses which animals to purchase in order to make a decent profit and get a good return on his investment. When he first started, he was sometimes tricked into buying sick animals that he could not resell and so lost money, but with consistency and perseverance he gained the necessary experience to become the successful trader he is today - making a profit and avoiding people's schemes. His goal for the future is to own a larger number of animals so that he can increase his sales and thus, his income. This is the second loan Dionisio will be receiving from MFP and he would like to keep working in solidarity with the communal bank so that he can continue to grow as a person and to improve his business. The loan will be used to buy more animals, such as lambs and piglets, so that he can increase his working capital.

Translated from Spanish by Sara Sultan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy animals to raise and sell.

loans.name: Irma

texts.en:
Like most women who have their own small business, Irma R. works hard and takes her business very seriously. However, unlike most small business owners, Irma lives at Santa Teresa Women's Prison.

Since being incarcerated over 5 years ago, Irma has been participating in a pilot program that FAPE is running in the women’s prison. Irma attends all of the training sessions that FAPE delivers and has already completely paid off her first loan. She is also extremely proud to say that she has begun saving a small amount of money, something she never thought she could do.

Although this loan is small, Irma will use the money to purchase materials for her crafts. By buying in bulk she can save money and increase her profits. Irma is a very cheerful and enthusiastic person. However she admits that sometimes it can be a struggle to keep morale high. She dreams of the day when she will be released and have her freedom and the opportunity to expand her business in the outsiD. world.

********************************************
Translated from Spanish by Andrea Bouch, Kiva Fellow. 
********************************************

Irma a pesar D. estar privada D. su libertad, continúa trabajando en su pequeño negocio D. elaboración y venta D. manualidades en la Cárcel D. Mujeres D. Guatemala, llamada “Santa Teresa”. Ella es una mujer muy alegre y entusiasta, que participa en todas las actividades D. capacitación que FAPE brinda a las mujeres D. la cárcel. Si préstamo aunque es muy pequeño, lo utilizara en la compra D. materiales, los cuales D. esta forma pueD. obtener a mejor precio y tener más ganancias en la venta D. los mismos. Irma sigue luchando por mantener su ánimo muy en alto, soñando el día que pueda salir D. la cárcel y tener su libertad, y allí seguir adelante por hacer más granD. su negocio.

loans.use: To buy materials in bulk for her crafts

loans.name: María

texts.es: María tiene 43 años, vive en su casa propia con su esposo y sus 6 hijos. Desde hace 29 años se dedica a las actividades agrícolas y ganaderas de manera independiente, junto a su esposo trabajan la tierra para obtener buenos frutos y compensar el trabajo realizado. La labor de María y de su familia consiste primero en preparar la tierra de sembrío, abonándola para que las plantaciones sean fuertes y resistan ante los problemas climáticos, luego el proceso de siembra, para el cual se tiene que arar la tierra, por consiguiente la cosecha y luego la comercialización de sus productos, para ver convertirse su trabajo en dinero, para los gastos de la familia. Adicionalmente, María y su esposo crían animales, ganado vacuno y ovino, con lo que respaldan aun más su economía, esta labor la realizan mientras esperan la temporada de cosecha. Por ello, han mejorado la estructura de su establo para dar mejor acogida a sus animales. María y su esposo están planificando para el futuro sembrar en mayor cantidad alfalfa, para alimentar a sus animales, sin tener que gastar en la compra de alimento. Es la segunda vez que tiene un préstamo con MFP, ella está muy satisfecha por la labor que está desempeñando dentro de su grupo, pues tiene muchos deseos de seguir trabajando con responsabilidad y puntualidad en sus pagos. El dinero que está solicitando será invertido en la compra de sacos de abono para preparar la tierra con miras a su próxima siembra.
texts.en:
Maria is a 43-year-old woman who lives in her own house with her husband and 6 children. For 29 years, she has been self-employed in agriculture and cattle ranching. She and her husband work the land to obtain great results and compensate their hard work. Maria and her family’s work consists of preparing the crop fields, fertilizing them so that the plants can be strong and resist harsh weather. Next, they need to sow seeds—for which they must plow the land. After that, they harvest the crops, and then sell the produce, thus turning their hard work into money for the family expenses. Additionally, Maria and her husband raise cattle—cows and sheep—so that they can further support the household. They partake in this field while waiting for the harvest. For this reason, they have improved their stables to provide a more comfortable place for their livestock. Maria and her husband are planning to grow greater amounts of alfalfa in the future so that they can feed their cattle without having to spend money on feed. This is the second time that she requests a loan from MFP. She is very satisfied with the work that she has doing within her group because she has the desire to continue working punctually and responsibly with her payments. The money that she is requesting will be invested in purchasing sacks of fertilizer in order to prepare her crop fields for the next sowing season.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase sacks of fertilizer

loans.name: Sofía

texts.es: Sofía tiene 47 años, vive con su esposo y dos de sus menores hijos en su casa propia. Desde hace 27 años se dedica a la agricultura y a la venta de sus productos; durante este tiempo, junto a su esposo, han forjado beneficios económicos para su hijos, que en su mayoría son personas adultas y sólo 2 de ellos viven con ellos en la actualidad, los cuales son un gran apoyo en las duras tareas del campo, sobre todo en el cuidado de los animales y la verificación de las tierras de cultivo. Sus cosechas son vendidas al por mayor y al por menor en su propio puesto de ventas que tiene en un mercado de su localidad. Para más adelante, Sofía desea ser  una importante ganadera de su zona y tener mayor cantidad de animales en su establo para seguir desarrollándose y creciendo. Es la segunda vez que está solicitando un préstamo con MFP, ella está muy satisfecha de seguir adelante con su banco comunal, pues considera que crece como persona aprendiendo el valor de la solidaridad. El dinero que ahora requiere es para la compra de sacos para empaquetar sus productos, también invertirá en el pago de transporte de su cosecha al mercado y en el pago de personal que contratará para cosechar.
texts.en:
Sofia is a 47-year-old woman who lives with her husband and 2 youngest children in her own house. For 27 years, she has been working in agriculture and sales. During this time, she and her husband have brought in profits for their children, who are mostly all adults now—except for the 2 who currently live with them. Her dependent children greatly support them with the arduous duties of the farm, particularly when looking after their livestock and overseeing their crop fields. She sells her produce wholesale and retail in her own stand at the local market. In the future, Sofia would like to become a prominent livestock farmer in her area, as well as have a greater amount of cattle in her stable so that her business can keep developing. This is the second time that she requests a loan from MFP. She is very satisfied to keep moving ahead with her microfinance institute because she believes that she is growing as a person and learning the value of solidarity. The money that she is requesting now will be used to purchase sacks so that she can pack her produce. She will also invest the money in covering transportation costs for getting her products to the market, and in paying the workers that she will hire for the harvest.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Product transportation costs and payment for farm workers

loans.name: Teofila

texts.es: Teofila tiene 28 años, vive con su esposo y sus tres hijos en su casa propia. Se dedica a la agricultura, a la ganadería y al comercio; tiene una tienda de abarrotes que implementó en su misma casa, de esta manera, todos los días vende en su misma tienda parte de los productos que cosecha y los fines de semana, en la feria ganadera, vende los animales que atiende en su establo. En la época de cosecha sus esfuerzos se concentran en recoger de sus tierras de cultivo el fruto del trabajo familiar de varios meses, y prepararlos para la comercialización. Para el futuro, Teofila desea intensificar sus actividades y tener más ingresos para solventar los gastos educativos de sus hijos. Es la segunda vez que tiene un préstamo con MFP, y está muy confortada de saber que pertenece a un grupo al que considera muy unido y solidario. El dinero que esta vez viene solicitando es para la compra de más abarrotes para su tienda, y a la vez, adquirir 4 sacos de abono.
texts.en:
Teofila is a 28-year-old woman who lives in her own home with her husband and three children. She partakes in agriculture, cattle ranching, and retail. She owns a general store that she set up in her home so that she can sell the crops that she harvests everyday. On weekends, she goes to the cattle market to sell the animals that she has in her stable. During harvest time, she focuses all her efforts on reaping the fruits of her family’s months-long labor, preparing the produce to be sold. In the future, Teofila would like to expand her business activities so that she can increase her income and cover her children’s educational costs. This is the second time that she obtains a loan with MFP, and it comforts her to know that she belongs to a group that she considers to be united and supportive. The money that she is requesting this time will be used to purchase more goods for her general store, as well as obtain 4 sacks of fertilizer.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase merchandise

loans.name: Alejo

texts.es: Alejo tiene 35 años, vive en su casa propia con su esposa y sus 4 hijos. Desde hace más de 15 año se dedica a las actividades ganaderas y agrícolas, aprendió desde su niñez, ya que proviene de una familia que se dedica a la agricultura. En la actualidad todo lo que ha aprendido le sirve para trabajar con toda su familia, sus hijos le ayudan a pastear los animales y en algunas otras tareas. A pesar de los problemas económicos que existieron en años anteriores por las pérdidas que sufrió, Alejo se orienta hacia un éxito en sus cosechas y la venta de sus animales porque ha llegado a ser capacitado con algunas charlas para progresar en su negocio. Para más adelante está pensando en mejorar su establo y sembrar más extensiones de terreno para aumentar sus ganancias. Es la segunda vez que Alejo viene solicitando un préstamo con MFP, él se siente muy contento de formar parte de su banco comunal porque tienen reuniones con mucha coordinación y tratan de ayudarse entre todos con sus negocios. El dinero que ahora requiere es para la compra de sacos de abono y fertilizantes para su próxima etapa de siembra.
texts.en:
Alejo is 35 years old, lives in a house he owns with his wife and four children. More than 15 years ago he started working in farming activities, which he learned during childhood because he comes from a farming family. Currently, everything he’s learned helps him work with his family, his children help him feed the cattle and in other activities. In spite of the economic problems that happened in prior years due to losses he suffered, Alejo is moving towards success in harvest and the sale of livestock because he has been taking some training in how to improve his business. He is thinking to later on improve his farm and use more crop land to increase his profit. This is the second time that Alejo requests a loan from MFP, he feels very happy by being part of the community bank because they have well coordinated meetings and they try to help each other in their respective businesses. The money requested is to buy fertilizer for the next crop season.

Translated from Spanish by Sofia Burt, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase fertilizer

loans.name: Lorenzo

texts.es: Lorenzo tiene 42 años, vive con su esposa y sus 4 hijos en su propia casa. Desde hace más de 15 años se dedica a las actividades agrícolas y ganaderas, empezó a dedicarse a esta actividad por medio de haber obtenido en herencia los terrenos de sus padres y por de los padres de su esposa. Desde ese entonces, labran la tierra incansablemente año tras año, de acuerdo al calendario de la siembra y la cosecha. Paralelamente a esto, Lorenzo se dedica a la ganadería, ya que tiene 4 vacas en su establo, de ellas extrae la leche para su consumo propio y para venta. Para Lorenzo y su familia dedicarse a las tareas agrícolas es la única fuente de ingresos que poseen porque no solo les genera recursos económicos, sino que también les provee de alimentos básicos para su hogar. Es la segunda vez que Lorenzo está solicitando un préstamo con MFP, y es de su agrado trabajar con sus propios vecinos, los cuales forman parte de su banco comunal. El dinero que ahora requiere lo invertirá en la compra de sacos de abono y fertilizante para sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Lorenzo, 42, lives with his wife and 4 children in his own home. For more than 15 years he has been working in agriculture and with livestock. He got started in this work because he inherited some land from his parents and from his wife’s parents. From then on they have been working the land tirelessly year after year as they follow the schedule for planting and harvesting. Along with this, Lorenzo has livestock. He has 4 cows in his stable. He milks them for his family’s use, and he sells the rest of the milk. The agricultural work is the only source of income for Lorenzo and his family. This work not only generates economic resources, but it also provides them with basic foods for their home. This is the second time that Lorenza has asked for a loan with MFP. It is his pleasure to work with his neighbors who form part of his community bank. He will use the loan to buy bags of fertilizer for his crops.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy fertilizer

loans.name: Roly

texts.es: Roly tiene 23 años, vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos en su casa propia. Se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y también, desde hace 4 años, ofrece el servicio de transporte de carga con su camión. Cada día, Roly se levanta muy temprano, con ayuda de su esposa realizan las actividades para el cuidado de sus animales, y de sus plantaciones de papa, maíz y otros productos nativos de su zona. Cuando es la época de cosecha o cuando llevan algunos de sus animales para venta, tiene la facilidad de contar con su propia movilidad para trasladarlos a la ciudad. Para más adelante, Roly desea incrementar la cantidad de animales y también tener otro camión para incrementar sus ganancias en la actividad del flete (servicio de transporte de carga). Es la segunda vez tiene un préstamo con MFP, en el ciclo anterior ha sido uno de los socios más activos y participativos de su banco comunal, hoy renueva su compromiso de seguir teniendo esta actitud en su grupo. La cantidad que viene solicitando será invertida en la compra de sacos de abono y fertilizantes para mejorar sus tierras de cultivo y asegurarse de tener una buena cosecha.
texts.en:
Roly is a 23-year-old man who lives with his wife and two children in his own house. He is involved in agriculture, cattle ranching, and, for 4 years now, he has been offering cargo transportation services with his truck. Everyday, Roly gets up very early. With the help of his wife, he looks after his livestock and works his crop fields, growing potatoes, corn, and other native produce. During harvest time or when they sell some of their livestock, he has the convenience of his own vehicle to transport them to the city. In the future, Roly would like to increase his number of cattle and also obtain another truck so that he can boost profits in his cargo transportation business. This is the second time that he requests a loan from MFP. In his previous loan cycles, he was one of the most active participants in his microfinance institute. He is now renewing his commitment to continue with this same attitude in his group. The money that he is requesting will be invested in purchasing sacks of compost and other fertilizers in order to improve his crop fields and ensure a good harvest.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase fertilizer

loans.name: Nieves

texts.es: Su actividad de la Sra. Nieves es la venta de comida tradicional boliviana por ejemplo Fricase de cerdo que consiste en carne de cerdo, chuño que es la papa deshidratada, y mote o maíz cocido.   los fines de semana en una de las calles de su barrio cerca de la cancha donde se aglomera mucha gente a observar los partidos de fútbol que hay en la zona que esta ubicado en la ladera oeste de la Ciudad de La Paz,  ella vende desde hace 8 años con la ayuda del esposo quien ayuda a la economía de la familia con la compra y venta de vehículos a medio uso,  tienen una pequeña niña en edad escolar . El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de utensilios de cocina como ser ollas grandes, platos de fierro enlosado etc, y otra parte lo invertirá en la compra de productos por cantidad por ejemplo el chuño que  se  puede guardar el tiempo que sea necesario ya que no se hecha a perder.
texts.en:
Nieves sells traditional Bolivian food. For example, she sells “Fricase” of pork, which is made of pork, “chuño” (dehydrated potato), and “mote” (cooked corn). She sells on week ends on one of her neighborhood streets, near the field where a lot of people gather to watch soccer games. This is located in her zone on the west side of the city of La Paz. She has been selling for 8 years. Her husband helps with the family economy by buying and selling second-hand vehicles. They have a young, school aged daughter. The loan will be used to buy kitchen utensils like big pots, glazed cast iron plates, etc. The other part of the loan will be used to buy products in bulk; for example “chuño” can be stored for a long period of time without spoiling.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy cups and glasses

loans.name: Giovana Silvia

texts.es: La Srta. Silvia tiene la actividad de servicio de desayunos en una entidad pública de nuestra ciudad, con la ayuda de su mama que desde tempranas horas de la mañana preparan los sándwich, cafés etc. Para dar una buena atención a la institución, de esta forma ayuda a sus hermanitos menores en el estudio y asimismo paga sus estudios de la Universidad , con el crédito que le brindaremos podrá renovar la vajilla que es su primera herramienta de trabajo, ella es muy responsable ya que trabaja con nosotros desde hace un año.
texts.en:
Senorita Silvia runs a breakfast diner in the city with her mother's help. Starting very early in the morning, the two prepare sandwiches and serve coffee. They are working to support Silvia's younger brothers and to pay for their education, as well as to pay for Silvia's own university tuition. The loan will be used to buy new dishes, crockery and cutlery, since these are the most important items they use. Silvia is very responsible and has been a member of her communal bank for one year.

Translated from Spanish by Sara Sultan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Dishes, crockery and cutlery

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es: Carmen tiene 47 años de edad, es casada y tiene dos hijos, actualmente toda la familia vive en una casa alquilada. Tras haber laborado dependientemente por muchos años en una entidad financiera, ahora se dedica a la venta de cosméticos, en lo que le va muy bien por cada campaña, ya que sus pedidos son de 1000 a 1700 soles cada vez, y sus ganancias 350 a 450 soles. Cada vez que tiene que recoger la caja con los productos, su esposo la apoya prestándole el dinero hasta que ella realice sus cobros en su totalidad y le devuelve.  A Carmen le gusta todo tipo de negocio, por ello que hace unos 4 meses incursionó también en la venta de “Rena Ware”, que es una línea de utensilios de cocina, lo cual dice estar resultándoles mucho mejor de lo que esperaba. Pero ello, no significa que reemplazará la venta de cosméticos, a la cual está ya muy acostumbrada, y conoce las cualidades y ventajas de cada uno de los productos de belleza y tiene una gran gama de clientes. Carmen acaba de asumir la presidencia de su banco comunal, por lo cual hace compromisos de cumplir con el cargo encomendado, Este es su 8vo préstamo con MFP, y en todo este tiempo ha demostrado ser una cliente muy responsable. El dinero que viene solicitando es para adquirir productos de belleza con un costo menor, aparte de los pedidos, de ese modo sus ganancias serán mayores.
texts.en:
Carmen is 47, married, and has two children. The whole family lives in a rented house. After years of working as an employee of a financial organization, she now works selling cosmetics. She does very well each season. Her orders are now 1000 to 1700 PEN every time, and her earnings are 350 to 450 PEN. Every time she has to pick up the box with the products, her husband supports her by lending her the money until she makes her total charges. Then, she returns the money to him. Carmen likes all types of business. That’s why 4 months ago she started selling “Rena Ware, a line of kitchen utensils. This is doing better than she thought. But, that does not mean that it will take the place of her selling cosmetics. She is very used to selling cosmetics; she knows the qualities and advantages of every one of her beauty products. She has a great range of customers. Carmen has just begun the presidency of her community bank. She promises to complete the duties in her charge. This is her 8th loan with MFP. In all of this time she has shown herself to be a very responsible customer. The loan is to buy additional beauty products at wholesale prices, which will lead to greater earnings.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase merchandise

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es: Carmen tiene 44 años, vive con su pareja y sus 4 hijos en su casa propia. Anteriormente se dedicaba a la venta de comida, explotaba al máximo sus virtudes culinarias preparando alimentos con ausencia de condimentos fuertes, de tal forma que facilitaba la buena digestión de sus comensales; pero su dificultad fue que en algunos meses no podía cubrir el costo del pago por el alquiler de su local. Entonces, al terminar de construir su casa, pensó en implementar un negocio de abarrotes en ella, y con este negocio ya lleva cerca de 5 meses, en los cuales viene captando clientela, y eso le causa mucha alegría y le complace, además de apoyar con las tareas escolares de sus hijos pequeños. Su esposo trabaja de chofer haciendo trasporte entre las ciudades de Huancayo y Tarma (trayecto de más o menos 2 horas); y también la apoya en la carga de la mercadería para la tienda. Carmen quiere mantener muy surtido su negocio para captar a todos sus vecinos y empezar a hacer de su tienda una actividad rentable. Ella es la tesorera de su banquito comunal, este es su 8vo préstamo con MFP, y en todo este tiempo ha demostrado pagar sus cuotas puntualmente. El dinero que ahora solicita es para que incrementar los productos de su bodega.
texts.en:
Carmen is a 44-year-old woman who lives with her partner and their 4 children in her own home. She used to own a food sales business in which she made use of her culinary skills by preparing meals without the use of too much seasoning. Thus, her meals promoted good digestion for her patrons. However, her problem was that she was unable to pay rent for her business space. As a result, after finishing construction of her house, she got the idea of setting up a general store there. She has been in this business for almost 5 months now, during which time she has been drawing in customers, which makes her feel happy. She also supports her young children with their school work. Her husband works as a driver, going from Huancayo to Tarma, which takes about 2 hours. He also transports merchandise to stores. Carmen wants to keep her business well-stocked so that she can draw in all her neighbors and start to make her general store more profitable. She is the treasurer of her microfinance institute. This is her 8th loan with MFP, and she has paid her installments punctually this whole time. The money that she is now requesting will be used to increase her general store goods.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase goods

loans.name: Evelin Petronila

texts.es:
En el municipio de Nagarote de la ciudad de León, la señora Eveling M. se dedica a su actividad de ganadería en la crianza de cerdos siendo esta su actividad con el cual atiende su familia la cual requiere de su apoyo para sobrevivir.

Ella se ha caracterizado por ser una dama muy trabajadora habiendo salido adelante y mejorado su situación económica. Hoy en día, la razón por la cual ella espera en Ceprodel es porque ha solicitado un crédito para la compra de ganado como son cerdos para proceder a su crianza y así desarrollarse en su actividad.
texts.en:
In the municipality of Nagarote, in the city of Leon, Señora Eveling M. pursues her livelihood of raising hogs. That's how she takes care of her family, who rely on her support in order to survive. She describes herself as a very hardworking lady who is making her way forward and improving her economic situation. Nowadays, her hope lies with CEPRODEL because she has requested a loan for the purchase of livestock, let's say pigs, so she can get going with raising them and develop her business.

Translated from Spanish by Daniel Kvaka, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy some pigs

loans.name: Celia

texts.es: Celia tiene exactamente 44 años cumplidos, es casada y tiene dos hijos. Hace 5 años viene trabajando en la venta de pasteles y pizzas en un local alquilado en una zona céntrica de la ciudad de Tarma, convirtiéndose en la pionera de este rubro, lo cual le permite organizar y dirigir a un grupo humano que trabaja con ella. Celia cuenta con un especialista en el preparado y decorado de pasteles y pizzas, cuidando el mínimo detalle en el proceso de la elaboración, con ingredientes de la mejor calidad para la satisfacción de sus clientes, además de dos señoritas encargadas de la venta. Las ganancias de este negocio le permiten pagar mensualmente el alquiler del local y el sueldo de su personal, por ello, Celia está muy feliz y agradecida con Dios y con la institución MFP que le ha permitido avanzar en su negocio, ahora tiene anhelos de poner un negocio similar en la Merced (ciudad cercana a Tarma). Celia comenta que hay muchos momentos amenos en las reuniones de su banco comunal, pero en el momento de efectuar los pagos debe ser serena, este es su 8vo préstamo con MFP, y en todo este tiempo ha demostrado puntualidad. El dinero que ahora solicita es para la compra de insumos e ingredientes de primera calidad, para la elaboración de cada una de sus tortas y pizzas.
texts.en:
Celia is a 44-year-old woman who is married and has two children. She has been selling cakes and pizza for 5 years in a rented office space in downtown Tarma. She has become a pioneer in this field, which allows her to organize and manage a good group of people who work with her. Celia has a specialist on her team who prepares and decorates the cakes and pizzas, paying attention to the smallest details and using the highest-quality ingredients for customer satisfaction. Two young ladies are in charge of selling her baked goods. The profits earned from this business allow her to pay both the monthly rent for her business space and her personnel’s salaries. For this reason, Celia is very happy and gives thanks to God and to MFP for allowing her to move ahead with her business. She now wishes to set up a similar business in La Merced—a city near Tarma. Celia states that she spends many enjoyable moments during her microfinance institute’s meetings, but when she needs to give her payments, she gets serious. This is her 8th loan with MFP, during which time she has demonstrated punctuality. The money that she is now requesting will be used to purchase supplies and high-quality ingredients so that she can make all of her cakes and pizzas.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase ingredients for cakes and pizzas

loans.name: Teodocia

texts.es: Teodocia cuenta con 47 años de edad, vive con su pareja y fruto de esta unión, tienen 5 hijos, los cuales son pequeños y aun viven en su casa. Hace 7 años viene trabajando en la venta de cerveza en un local alquilado, este negocio le ha resultado muy rentable, y sus ganancias le han permitido cubrir la educación de sus hijos. Por ello quiere incrementar su negocio, con la venta de con abarrotes y zapatos, porque ha hecho contacto con fabricantes de esta línea quienes le están proponiendo que se encargue de vender su producción, pero aún no tiene el capital necesario para emprender este negocio. Los fines de semana, es cuando Teodocia obtiene mayores ganancias, porque su local su establecimiento está ubicado frente a una loza deportiva, y en su mayoría, lo varones, luego de jugar futbol se acercan a refrescarse con algunas cervezas heladas. Por las tardes, también los fines de semana, Teodocia prepara comida y café caliente para captar mayores ingresos, esta actividad es una distracción para ella, y de paso va acumulando ingresos económicos para el bienestar de su familia. Teodocia es una persona muy jocosa, lo que demuestra en cada reunión de su banco comunal; siempre ha tratado de pagar puntualmente cuotas y este es el 8vo préstamo que trabaja con MFP, donde ha demostrado responsabilidad en las tareas encomendadas. El dinero que solicita es para incrementar con comestibles su negocio, con la finalidad de captar nueva clientela.
texts.en:
Teodocia is 47 years old, lives with her partner, and has 5 children who are still young and live in her house. She has been working selling beer in a rented locale for the past 7 years. This business has proven to be very profitable, and her earnings have allowed her the ability to finance her children’s educations. For this reason, she would like to expand her business to include the sale of groceries and shoes. She knows many manufacturers in this arena who are proposing that she carry their product lines to sell. However, she still doesn’t have the necessary capital to embark on this business. Teodocia earns the most on weekends because she is located in front of a sports venue. After playing their soccer matches, the men for the most part, frequent her location to enjoy a refreshing cold beer. In the afternoons and on weekends Teodocia also prepares food and hot coffee to augment her income. This activity is a distraction for her and, over time, she accumulates income for the well-being of her family. Teodocia is a very humorous person, which she demonstrates at each gathering of the members of her cooperative bank. She has always tried to make her loan payments on time, and this is the 8th loan she has had working with MFP. She has demonstrated her responsible nature with the tasks at hand. The funds she is requesting are to increase food products for her business, with the aim of attracting additional customers.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn Malaby, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase her merchandise.

loans.name: Fátima Del Socorro

texts.es:
En el municipio de Nagarote de la ciudad de León, la señora Fatima C. se dedica a su actividad de crianza de cerdos siendo este su medio por el cual mantiene su familia compuesta por ella y su pequeña hija siendo ella madre soltera y por esto ha duplicado sus esfuerzos para mejorar su situación.

Hoy en día ha buscado el apoyo en Ceprodel para ser beneficiada con un crédito para la compra de los cerdos para proceder a su crianza y luego extraer la carne para comercializarla en su localidad.
texts.en:
In the Nagarote municipality of the city of León, Fatima C. dedicates herself to the raising of pigs. This is the means by which she supports her family, composed of herself and her small daughter since she is a single mother. For this reason, she has had to duplicate her efforts in order to improve her situation. Today, she has sought out the help of Ceprodel to become the beneficiary of a loan to purchase pigs to raise. She then sells their meat throughout her locality.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn Malaby, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: For the purchase of pigs.

loans.name: Vilma Lucia

texts.es: La señora Vilma vende ropa y cosméticos desde hace cuatro años, negocio que inicio con dinero que su esposo dio y prestamos que  Afodenic atorgo, este es su octavo crédito. Tiene 49 años de edad, reside en Villa Venezuela, tiene cuatro hijos  los cuales estudian, su esposo es promotor de venta. Con este crédito quiere cambiar el techo de su casa ya que esta en mal estado. Da la gracias a la institución por la oportunidad que ha brindado por que ha podido lograr las metas propuestas. Sus planes es poder invirtiendo en su negocio, seguir haciendo mejoras a su casa y poder ayudar a sus hijos con los estudios.
texts.en:
Vilma has been selling clothing and cosmetics for the past four years, a business she started with money her husband gave her and a loan granted to her by Afodenic. This is her eighth loan. She is 49 years old, lives in Villa Venezuela, has four children who are students, and her husband is in sales. She would like to replace the roof of her house, which is in bad shape, with this loan. She gives thanks to the institution for the opportunities it has provided, because she has been able to meet her goals. Her plans include being able to invest in her business, continuing to make improvements to her house, and helping her children with their educations.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn Malaby, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase materials to replace the roof of her house, which is in bad shape.

loans.name: Félix Alberto

texts.es:
Felix P. es un caballero originario del municipio de Nagarote en la ciudad de León donde se dedica a laborar arduamente para mejorar su condición de vida y la de su familia que tanto necesita su apoyo.

Con mucho sacrificio ha logrado salir adelante y hoy en día ha iniciado a mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda por medio de una reconstrucción que ha iniciado actualmente. Hoy en día él ha acudido a Ceprodel para solicitar un crédito para la compra de los materiales de construcción para así salir adelante brindándole mejores condiciones de vida a toda su familia
texts.en:
Felix P. is a gentleman originally from the municipality of Nagarote in the city of León, where he dedicates himself to working arduously to improve his standard of living and that of his family who greatly needs his support. With much sacrifice, he has managed to get ahead. Currently, he has started making improvements to his house through a construction effort he has initiated. He has turned to Ceprodel to request a loan for the purchase of construction materials, so he can move forward providing better living conditions for his entire family.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn Malaby, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Gloria Maria

texts.es: La señora Gloria tiene 52 años de edad, reside en el barrio 14 de Febrero de la Iglesia Fraternidad 2 c al este 1 c al norte en la ciudad de Managua, con 4 hijos todo mayores e independiente. Su esposo vende productos lácteos, y su negocio es una pulpería que la inicio con ahorros que tenia. Lleva nueve años de estar administrando y tres ciclo de préstamos en Afodenic el cual ha podido mantener un inventario variado, el cual ha generado clientela ya que ha podido cubrir las necesidades del cliente y las de su familia que considera de muchos beneficios para el desarrollo de su negocio. Con esta solicitud quiere compra granos básicos, golosinas, gaseosa y comprar productos de sardinas para esta temporada de la semana santa ya que la gente la consume mucho. Sus planes es poder es poder apoyar a sus hijos y tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Gloria is 52 years old and lives in the 14th of February neighborhood, north of the city of Managua. She has 4 children who are now grown and independent. Her husband sells dairy products, and her business is a grocery store that she started with some of her savings. She has been managing her store for nine years, and has been through three loan cycles with Afodenic. The loans have helped her to maintain a varied inventory supply in her store, which has generated customers since she has been able to meet their demands. She has also been able to meet the needs of her family, which considers the loans to be very beneficial toward her efforts to grow her business. With this request she would like to buy basic grains, sweets/snacks, sodas, as well as sardine products that are in high demand during this season of Holy Week. Her plans include being able to support her children and improving her income.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn Malaby, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase basic grains, sardines, and canned products.

loans.name: Alexander

texts.es: Alexander tiene 23 años de edad, es soltero, vive con sus padres y su hermana. Desde hace 3 años se dedica a la agricultura, al cultivo de arroz, maíz y otros tipos de granos, ya que tiene una pequeña piladora (instrumento para el descascaro y pulido del grano) con la trabaja sus productos luego de la cosecha. Alexander cuenta con el apoyo de toda su familia para los trabajos agrícolas, lo que le satisface grandemente, además le gusta mucho su trabajo, ya que desde muy pequeño incurrió en esta actividad. Este negocio le es rentable porque sus productos (arroz, maíz, fréjol, entre otras variedades de granos) los lleva listos para la venta al mercado y los comercializa a buen precio que le permite obtener ganancias acordes a su trabajo. Más adelante, Alexander quiere dedicarse también a la crianza de vacunos. Esta es la primera vez que tiene un préstamo con MFP, y le gusta trabajar con su banco comunal porque le brindan confianza y todos sus integrantes son muy responsables. El dinero que ahora solicita lo invertirá en la compra de más granos (semilla) para sembrar, lo que le costará 200 soles; con lo restante pagará el mantenimiento de su máquina de granos.
texts.en:
Alexander is 23, single, and lives with his parents and sister. For 3 years he has been involved in agriculture, the cultivation of rice, corn and other types of grains. He has a small husker (a machine that takes the shells off and refines the grains) that he uses for his grains after the harvest. Alexander has the support of all of his family for his agricultural work, and that makes him extremely satisfied. Also, he really likes his work, which he has been involved in since he was very small. This business is profitable because he takes his products (rice, corn, beans, and other grains) ready for sale to the market, and he receives a good price for his work. Later, Alexander would like to also raise cattle. This is his first loan with MFP. He likes working with his community bank because it gives him confidence, and all of the members are very responsible. He will use the loan to buy more grains (seeds) to plant. That will cost 200 PEN. The rest he will use to pay for the maintenance of his husker.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy seeds and maintenance of his husker

loans.name: Justa Victoria

texts.es:
En el municipio de Nagarote de la ciudad de León con mucho ahínco la señora Justa R. se dedica a su actividad de venta de comida y refrescos en su propio kiosko que ha desarrollado para ofertar sus platillos y bebidas a las personas que le visitan.

Es de mucha importancia destacar que hoy en día la señora Justa ha acudido a Ceprodel para ser beneficiada con un crédito para invertirlo en la mejora del kiosko para darle una mejor atención a sus clientes y de esta forma continuar saliendo adelante en su negocio que tanto requiere de mucha inversión.
texts.en:
Mrs. Justa R. very diligently sells food and refreshments in the municipality of Nagarote in the city of León. She has set up her own kiosk to offer food and drink to the people who visit. Justa has come to Ceprodel for a loan to make improvements to her kiosk. This way she can better serve her customers and continue getting ahead in her business, which is in great need of this investment.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Improvements to her place of business

loans.name: Ana

texts.es: Ana tiene 33 años de edad, vive con su esposo y su único hijo en su propia casa. Ella vende repuestos para autos y motocarros en todas las variedades, lleva un periodo de 3 años y su negocio se encuentra dentro de su casa. Ana cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo, quien es mecánico y el encargado de colocar los repuestos a los vehículos de las personas que concurren al negocio. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que se relaciona con todas las personas que acuden a comprar sus repuestos y darles una buena atención es lo principal para ella, además le es rentable porque debido a la gran cantidad de motocarros en su ciudad, vende diariamente, lo que le genera bueno ingresos para solventar los gastos familiares. Para más adelante, Ana quiere mandar a construir un lavadero de autos y motocarros, para brindar un servicio adicional a sus clientes. Con MFP, ya tiene 13 préstamos, su banco comunal se llama “Campo Verde”, nombre de la zona donde vive ella y sus compañeros de grupo, le gusta así porque todos son muy cumplidos y responsables. El dinero que viene solicitando lo invertirá en la compra de más repuestos para su tienda.
texts.en:
Anna is 33 years old, and lives with her husband and only child in her own home. She sells all kinds of spare parts for cars and motorcars. She has been doing this for the last 3 years, and her business is home-based. Ana is helped by her husband, who is a mechanic and he is in charge of the installation of the parts in her customers' cars. What she likes about her work is that she is contact with all people that come to buy parts. Taking good care of them is the most important thing for her. Additionally, the business is profitable because there are many motorcars in her town. She sells a lot everyday, and this generates a good income to pay for the family expenses. In the future, Ana want to build a car and motorcar wash in order to provide additional services to her customers.

She has had 13 loans with MFP. Her communal bank is called "Campo Verde", which is the name of the neighborhood where she and the other group members live. She likes it this way because they all are very motivated and responsible.

She will invest the loan that she is requesting to buy more parts for her store.

Translated from Spanish by Ramon Kolb, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy more spare parts

loans.name: Anicia

texts.es: Anicia tiene 50 años, vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos quienes cursan estudios técnicos y la apoyan mucho. Tiempo atrás se dedicaba a la crianza de pollos, pero a razón de no serle muy rentable, decidió vender bebidas en un espacio que acondicionó en su domicilio, actividad que viene realizando desde hace 4 años, donde también cuenta con el apoyo de sus hijos y de su esposo. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es dar una buena atención a sus clientes y que los mismos se sientan satisfechos y contentos de comprar en su negocio, así regresan y la recomiendan. Este trabajo, además le es muy rentable, ya que lo que ofrece son productos que tienen mucha demanda, en especial helados, por encontrarse en una ciudad de la selva peruana donde la temperatura es muy alta, y las personas siempre buscan cómo refrescarse y satisfacer su sed. Para más adelante, Anicia quiere mandar a construir un local apropiado para su negocio, y así dar una mejor acogida a sus clientes. Este es su primer préstamo con MFP, y el dinero que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de más bebidas, tanto cervezas, como gaseosas.
texts.en:
Anicia is 50, and she lives with her husband and her two children who are pursuing technical degrees. A while back she raised chickens, but that was not very profitable. She decided to sell drinks in a space that she set up in her home. She has been doing this for 4 years. She receives support from her children and her husband. What she likes about her work is taking good care of her customers, having them feel satisfied and happy to buy from her, and having them return and recommend her. This work is very profitable because the products she offers are in much demand, especially ice cream. People in a Peruvian jungle city, where the temperatures are very high, always look for ways to refresh themselves and satisfy their thirst. In the future Anicia would like to build an appropriate space for her business in order to give her customers a better welcome. This is her first loan with MFP. She will use the loan to buy more drinks like beer and soft drinks.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase merchandise

loans.name: Mario

texts.es: La familia de Mario está compuesta por su esposa y sus tres hijos, toda la familia vive en una casa que es propia y se encuentra ubicada en la zona de la Urbanización olmedo, la vivienda si bien precaria esta construida con buen material. Mario se dedica al transporte de pasajeros (esposo) en la flota Bolívar. La esposa atiende una pequeña tienda de barrio en su domicilio, donde vende picoles (helados), comida rápida y refrescos. La competencia, en el caso de la esposa es mínima, puesto que no existen muchas tiendas de este tipo en la zona, mas aún, ella prepara comida los días viernes para los profesores de la escuela del lugar. El destino del crédito es la finalización de la construcción de ambientes para el negocio de la esposa. El anterior crédito se cancelo sin problemas, se trata de clientes muy responsables.
texts.en:
Mario’s family is made up of his wife and his three children. They all live together in their own home, which is located in the Urbanización Olmedo zone. Although the house is meager, it is built with good material. Mario works in transportation with the Bolívar fleet. His wife tends a small neighborhood store in their home. She sells ice cream, fast food and drinks. She has little competition because there are not many stores of this type in the zone. She also prepares meals on Fridays for the local school teachers. The loan will be used to finish construction of his wife’s business. They are very responsible customers, and they paid their last loan without problem.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Finish construction of neighborhood store

loans.name: Arturo

texts.es: Arturo tiene 48 años de edad, vive con su hija, yerno y nietos. La casa donde viven es de su hija. Desde hace 7 años se dedica a brindar servicios de transporte en su propio motocarro, trabaja durante todo el día, a razón de ser padre soltero y velar por sus propias necesidades, ya que todos sus hijos son ya mayores de edad y con familias propias. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que conoce muchos lugares y trata con algunas personas que le enseñan técnicas y estrategias para aumentar sus ganancias en el tipo de labor que realiza. En la ciudad de Pucallpa, el principal medio de transporte es el motocarro, por ello, le es rentable, ya que el mismo maneja y administra sus ganancias diarias. Arturo considera que lo más difícil de su trabajo es cuando no tiene en buenas condiciones su vehículo y no contar con un garaje para guardarlo. Con MFP, ya tiene 8 préstamos, y le gusta mucho trabajar con su banco comunal porque los integrantes son unidos y puntuales en los pagos. Arturo desde invertir el dinero que solicita ahora en la reparación de su motocarro, cambiar algunos piezas y sin preocupaciones, por lo que gastará un promedio de 1000 soles. Lo restante lo usará en sus cultivos, para obtener una buena cosecha, pues cuenta con unas 18 hectáreas de palmito (palma aceitera).
texts.en:
Arturo is 48 years old and lives with his daughter, son-in-law and grandchildren in his daughter’s house. For 7 years now he has provided transportation services with his own motor-car. He works all day because he is a single father and wants to take care of his own needs; his children are now grown and have their own families. What he enjoys about his work is that he gets to know a lot of places and he tries to learn from some people the technical aspects of his work and strategies for increasing the income he earns from his type of business. The principal mode of transportation within the city of Pucallpa is by moto-car. For this reason, his enterprise is profitable given that he himself drives his vehicle and administers his daily earnings. Arturo considers the most difficult aspect of his business to be when his moto-car is in disrepair, and not having a garage to use for storage. He already has had 8 loans with MFP, and he enjoys working with the cooperative bank greatly because the members are united and timely with their loan payments. Arturo wants to invest the funds he is requesting into repairs for his moto-car, specifically for some replacement parts, for which he will spend 1,000 soles. He will invest the remaining funds into his crops in order to have a good harvest. He has 18 hectares of palmetto trees.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn Malaby, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To maintain his moto-car, and invest into his crops.

loans.name: Isidro

texts.es: Isidro vive con sus 3 hijos en su domicilio que es propio y que se encuentra ubicado en Villa Candelaria. La casa de Isidro cuenta con el respectivo registro en DDRR. La construcción es de material, tiene 3 cuartos y una pequeña cocina. Isidro se dedica a prestar servicios de pasajeros (con chofer) con una movilidad propia. También se dedica a prestar servicios de albañilería. Cuenta con experiencia en ambos ramos lo que le permite asegurar los ingresos. La competencia en el transporte es alta, debido a la gran cantidad de competidores que presenta, pero el trabaja con una línea, lo que de alguna manera mitiga esta situación. El destino del crédito es realizar mejoras en la vivienda, desea construir un cuarto o remodelar uno de los que tiene. El anterior crédito se cancelo con total normalidad.
texts.en:
Isidro lives with his 3 children in a house he owns, located in Villa Candelaria. The home has the respective registration of DDRR, and has 3 rooms and a small kitchen. Isidro dedicates himself to providing passenger transportation services (with a driver) using his own vehicle. He also dedicates himself to providing construction services. He counts on experience in both areas, which allows him to secure his means of income. Competition within the transportation business is high, given the large amount of rival enterprises. He, however, works with one line and this helps mitigate this situation. The loan funds would be designated for making improvements to his home, as he wants to build an additional room and remodel an existing one. His previous loan was canceled in a timely manner and without any issues.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn Malaby, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To remodel and make improvements to his home.

loans.name: Cecilia De

texts.es: Cecilia de 58 años de edad, es casada, tiene 3 hijas mayores, que ya son independientes, dos de ellas se encuentran en España y la otra acá en el país. La vivienda donde vive Cecilia es propia. Cecilia se dedica al comercio de ropa usada, también tiene venta de comida y su esposo recibe renta de jubilado. Tiene bastante experiencia en este negocio, la competencia es media, el crédito es para construcción, ella ha tenido un buen comportamiento crediticio, además ha tenido 5 créditos en agrocapital con buen comportamiento crediticio.
texts.en:
Cecilia is 58 years old, married, and has 3 grown children who are now living independently; two are in Spain, and the third is still here in the country. The house where Cecilia lives is her own. Cecilia dedicates herself to selling used clothing as well as food, and her husband receives a retirement pension. She has a great deal of experience in her business, within which there is some competition. The loan funds are for construction use, and her credit history is good. She has had five loans with Agrocapital, all of which she has undertaken in a responsible manner.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn Malaby, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: For home repairs.

loans.name: Angela Vda De

texts.es: La familia de Ángela se compone de sus 6 hijos que tienen: 22, 18, 16, 10, 6 y 4 años de edad respectivamente, con domicilio propio en minero barrio oriental. Su negocio esta ubicado sobre la Av. Principal de la localidad donde vende comidas y cervezas, es competitivo a su entorno pero por los años de antigüedad y experiencia en la zona tiene mucha demanda en sus productos. El destino de crédito es para capital de operación (ampliación de su negocio),  tiene un excelente  comportamiento con nuestra institución. No tiene deudas directas con otras entidades financieras.
texts.en:
Ángela’s family is comprised of her 6 children who are 22, 18, 16, 10, 6 and 4 years of age, respectively. She has her own home in the eastern mining neighborhood. Her business is located on a primary street where she sells food and beer. It is a competitive environment but, given her years in business and her experience in the area, she enjoys a great demand for her products. The loan funds will be destined for operating capital (expanding her business), and she has an excellent history with our institution. She doesn’t have any direct debt with other financial entities.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn Malaby, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Operating capital.

loans.name: Dolores Erika

texts.es: Dolores tiene 33 años de edad respectivamente, tiene 2 hijos y su esposo se encuentra en trabajando en España. Por otra parte Dolores y su familia viven en una casa que es propia y que está dotada de todos los servicios básicos. Cuenta con su propia venta de abarrotes en su domicilio, un punto de llamadas y percibe renta de una vagoneta. Su venta esta bien surtida, bien ubicada y con bastante afluencia de clientes, donde la competencia no le afecta porque es la única en la zona. El destino del crédito es para compra de otra cabina de llamadas.  Ellos son clientes desde el año 2002 con ocho créditos en la institución con pagos puntuales.
texts.en:
Dolores is 33 years old, has 2 children, and her husband is working in Spain. Dolores and her family live in a house that they own, and which has all the basic services. She has her own business selling groceries from her home, a phone center, and also earns income from the rental of a minibus. Her store is well-supplied, well-located, and enjoys a great influx of customers. Competition doesn’t impact her since she is the only such business in the area. The loan funds will be destined for the purchase of another phone cubicle. They have been clients since 2002, and have had eight credits with the institution that they have repaid in a timely manner.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn Malaby, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: For the purchase of a phone cubicle.

loans.name: Herlan

texts.es: Herland B. tiene 46 años de edad, recién se ha juntado con su concubina. Tiene 1 hijo de su primera novia, antes no se casó pero ahora ya tiene planes de boda con su actual cónyuge la cual no ha participado del crédito porque no tiene carnet de identidad. Herlan se dedica al transporte público de taxis, tiene su propio vehículo que lo conduce personalmente en el área urbana de Santa Cruz, tiene muchos años de experiencia en esta actividad. La competencia en el sector del transporte es alta pero también lo es la demanda por este servicio. El crédito fue destinado para la compra de la deuda o subrogación que tenia en su anterior crédito donde participaban 3 personas como codeudores y era él el único que cancelaba estas cuotas. Es un buen cliente con un excelente historial de pagos en la institución.
texts.en:
Herlan B. is 46 years old and recently moved in with his girlfriend. He has one son with his first girlfriend who he did not marry, but now he has wedding plans with his current girlfriend who has not been able to participate in the loans because she does not have an identity card. Herlan is in the business of public transport via taxis, he has his own vehicle which he personally drives in the urban area of Santa Cruz, and he has many years of experience in this activity. The competition in the transportation sector is high but there is also demand for the service.

The loan is destined for the payment of assumed debt that he has from a previous loan where three co-debtors participated and he was the only one who paid the debt. He is a good customer with an excellent payment history in the institution.

Translated from Spanish by William Gray, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Payment of debt

loans.name: Dario

texts.es: Darío que cuenta con 63 años vive en su propia casa ubicada en la comunidad de "chimbote" junto a su esposa de 58 años respectivamente. La pareja tiene hijos que si bien son independientes los visitan cada fin de semana. Darío recibe una renta mensual por su jubilación de la empresa nacional de ferrocarriles. Junto a su esposa tienen una venta de abarrotes y otros desde hace varios años en su misma casa. No existe competencia para su negocio ya que en es la única tienda en la zona y sobre todo que esta sobre el camino que une a otras comunidades, por tal motivo tiene mucha salida en cuanto a los productos que oferta, ya que son mayormente de la canasta de primera necesidad. Darío tenia previsto comprar por lo menos unos dos artefactos para su negocio, pero solamente comprara un freezer de aproximadamente $us. 500,-  y el resto lo esta ocupando para poner a punto su camión que compro para explotarlo en la próxima zafra cañera. Este es el tercer préstamo del cliente y todos los anteriores los a cancelado puntualmente. El no tiene deuda en ninguna otra financiera.
texts.en:
Darío, 63, lives in his own house, which is located in the “Chimbote” community. He lives with his wife who is 58. They have independent children who visit them every week end. Darío receives a monthly income for his retirement from the national business of railroads. For many years he and his wife have been selling groceries in their home. There is no business competition because they are the only store in the zone. Also, they are on the road that joins other communities. There is a lot of demand for the products they offer, which are primarily basic needs items. Darío had been planning to buy at least two items for his business, but he will only buy a freezer for approximately $500 U.S. The rest he will spend to tune up his truck, which he bought to use in the next sugar cane harvest. This is his third loan, and he has paid the previous ones on time. He does not have any debt with any other finance companies.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy a freezer and tune up truck

loans.name: Gotitas Group

texts.es: Las socias del grupo Gotitas en su mayoría se dedican al comercio, algunas a la venta de comida rápida, otras a la venta de dulces en casetas y otras a la venta de frutas en mercado, este grupo entro en su tercer ciclo de trabajo con Agrocapital con un comportamiento muy aceptable, ello por que el tipo de crédito que ofrece la institución les es muy conveniente.Las actividades a las que se dedican las socias son: VENTA DE DULCES EN QUIOSCO, VENTA DE LLANTAS, PRESTACIÓN DE SERVICIOS, VENTA DE CAFE Y MASITAS, VENTA DE DULCES Y MASITAS, VENTA DE PRODUCTOS HERVALIFE, VENTA DE FRUTAS, VENTA DE REFRESCOS Y FRUTAS, VENTA DE PRODUCTOS DE BELLEZA, PRESTA SERVICIOS, VENTA DE ABARROTES y VENTA DE DULCES.
texts.en:
The members of the Gotitas (Droplets) group are mostly dedicated to trade, some in the sale of fast food, some in the sale of sweets at stands, and others in the sale of fruit in markets. This group is now entering its third cycle of work with Agrocapital with very acceptable behavior, this because the type of credit that the institution offers them is very desirable.

The activities that the members engage in are: the sale of candy in a kiosk, the sale of tires, providing services, the sale of coffee and pastries, the sale of candy and pastries, the sale of Hervalife Nutrition products, the sale of fruits, the sale of sodas and fruits, the sale of hair products, rendering services, the sale of groceries, and the sale of candy.

Translated from Spanish by William Gray, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Business

loans.name: Gorgonia

texts.en:
Mrs. Gorgonia T., 47 years old, is a widow and lives in the town of Aloran. She has 5 children of which 3 are in school and 2 have their own families. She is still mourning from the sudden death of her husband in March 2009. Gorgonia has remained strong for the family now that she has to raise them all by herself.

Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative, Kiva's partner, eased the burial expenses as part of the benefits of being a member. She became a member in December 2007 and has availed loans four times already. She ventured into a “sari-sari” (general) store and successfully manages it. Today she has applied for PHP 12,000 to buy additional goods for sale.

Aside from the pension she will be receiving after her husband's death, she really hopes that someday she will be able to survive and provide a comfortable life to her children.

loans.use: to buy additional goods for sari-sari store

loans.name: Arlyn

texts.en:
Mrs. Arlyn D., 36 years old, is married and lives at Lower Lamac, Oroquieta City. She has 2 children. Her husband is a private employee. After joining Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative, Kiva's partner, in February 2007, she learned that she must have alternative sources of income aside from that of her husband.

Paglaum members were taught entrepreneurial skills for them to use in their livelihood projects, and that’s why she opened a “sari-sari” (general) store. It only started with PHP 3,000 as initial capital. Until today, the store still exists.

Now, she is applying for PHP 14,900 to buy additional goods for her sari-sari store. She will be happy enough if she sees all her children finish their studies.

loans.use: to buy additional goods for sari-sari store

loans.name: Rosalia

texts.en:
Mrs. Rosalia M., 58 years old, is married and lives in the city of Oroquieta. She was blessed with 4 children. Her husband is a farmer.

She has a “sari-sari” (general) store to support the daily needs of her family. Her customers are neighbors, friends and passers-by. The idea of owning a store came into reality because of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative, Kiva's partner. The coop provides capitalization to starters. She became a member in September 2008.

For the second time, she is applying for PHP 7,000 to buy additional goods for sale. Hopefully, she will be able to sustain the business and be able to send all her children to school.

loans.use: to buy additional goods for sari-sari store

loans.name: Nelyn

texts.en:
Mrs. Nelyn T., 47 years old, is married and lives at Aloran, Misamis Occidental. She has 2 children. Her husband is a farmer. In order to help her husband, she opened a “sari-sari” store in front of their house. The daily consumption needs of her family sometimes will be derived from the income of the store.

In June 2008, she joined Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative, Kiva's partner, to avail of its loan facilities including benefits given to members like savings, patronage refund, dividend, and insurances. Today, she is applying for PHP 10,000 to buy additional goods for sale. She plans to expand her business into a mini-grocery someday.

loans.use: to buy  additional goods for sari-sari store

loans.name: Domingo

texts.en:
Mr. Domingo T. is 54 years old and lives at San Vicente, Oroquieta City. He is married and has 3 children. His wife is a farm caretaker and all his children are schooling. His source of income is driving a tricycle.

He became a member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative in February 2009. He became interested in the programs and services that the cooperative offers. Mr. T. decided to apply for a loan of PHP 5,000 to repair his motorcycle vehicle that was damaged. He will not be able to generate daily income if his motorcycle is not repaired. He hopes that someday he will be able to buy another motorcycle for hire.

loans.use: To repair his motorcycle

loans.name: Esterlita

texts.en: "Simple woman" describes Mrs. Esterlita T., who is 59 years old, married and lives at Conat, Aloran, Misamis Occidental. She has 8 children. Her husband is a driver. In order to help her husband for a living, she decided to sell flowers. She got this idea of selling flowers from a friend who taught her about this business. Mrs. T. was only able to start this business when she joined Paglaum Multi-purpose Cooperative last August 2005 and has received loans several times already. Today, she applies for PHP 4,000 to purchase additional orchids or other ornamental flowers for sale. In the future, she really wants to have a parcel of land for ornamental flower plantation.

loans.use: to purchase flowers to resell

loans.name: Juliana

texts.en: Mrs. Juliana D. is 47 years old, married and lives at San Vicente Bajo, Oroquieta City. She was blessed with only one child. Her husband is a carpenter. Their other source of income is from her “sari-sari” (general) store.  She also sells goods in front of elementary school. Being a member of Paglaum Multi-purpose cooperative really helped her especially in the capitalization of her business. She became a member last August 2008. The coop offers loans, savings and insurances. Now, she applies for PHP 4,000 to buy additional goods for sale. In the future, she wants to expand her “sari-sari” store into a grocery store someday.

loans.use: to buy additional goods for a general store

loans.name: Elma

texts.en: Mrs. Elma T. is 47 years old, married and lives at Mohon, Aloran, Misamis Occidental. She is blessed with 4 children. Her husband is a farmer. Her other source of income is from making nipa huts (the native house constructed out of bamboo with a thatched roof using nipa leaves). She obtained a loan from Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) and started to buy nipa. Last May 2005, she became an official member of the cooperative. She was impressed by the programs and services that PMPC offers and that’s why she joined. Now, she applies for PHP 10,000 to buy additional nipa to be used on nipa huts.

loans.use: to buy nipa for nipa hut making

loans.name: Rodulfo

texts.en: "Responsible man" describes Mr. Rodulfo B., 62 years old, married and resides at Tabo-o, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. He has 4 children. He has children who have families of their own. Rodulfo and his wife manages their snack-inn. Last November 2006, he joined Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative to request additional working capital for his snack-inn. Fortunately, they have managed the business so well. They were able to send their children to school and able to sustain the needs of their family. Now, he applies for PHP 12,000 to buy breads & soft drinks. He hopes that his business will continue throughout the years despite the business challenges.

loans.use: to buy additional goods for resale

loans.name: Jane

texts.en: Mrs. Jane T. is 31 years old, married and lives at San Vicente Alto, Oroquieta City. She has 2 children. Her husband is a tricycle driver. Determination and hard work are what Mrs. T. believes in. She joined Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative last July 2007 to avail herself of its loan facilities. The coop taught their members to have a "livelihood project," or business, in order to become productive and self-reliant. At this time, her husband drives a tricycle they bought with a loan which they have since paid off. Now, she applies for PHP 35,000 to buy additional goods for sale and franchise for their tricycle.

loans.use: to buy additional goods for sale and franchise for tricycle

loans.name: Merlyn

texts.en: Mrs. Meryn R. is 32 years old, married and lives at Poblacion, Oroquieta City. She has 2 children. Her husband is a government employee but receives only a minimum wage rate. All her children are sent to private schools. In this case, she has to have an extra income for the coming school year. She decided to join Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative last August 2008 to avail its loan facilities. They started a business buying and selling firewood after their wedding day. The initial capital was a gift from their parents. Today, she applies for PHP 7,000 to buy additional firewood, goods and electronic load for “sari-sari” (general) store. She’s hopeful that she will be able to send all her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional goods/utilities for a general store

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.en:
Mrs. Rosalina B., 63 years old, is married and lives at Tuyabang Alto, Oroquieta City. She has four children. Her husband is a farmer.

At her age, she really wanted to help her husband, that’s why she opened a “sari-sari” (general) store to provide additional income. This will help in the daily consumption of her family. She got her capital from Paglaum Multi-purpose Cooperative and became a member in February 2006. She's thankful to this co-op, because she was able to send her children to school and was able to finance their farm. Aside from that, she learned the value of savings.

Today, she applies for PHP 14,900 to buy additional goods for sale. She hopes that throughout the years, their family will live a comfortable life.

loans.use: To buy additional goods for her sari-sari store

loans.name: Mardonia

texts.en:
Mrs. Mardonia B., 48 years old, is married and lives at Mobod, Oroquieta City. She is blessed with seven children. Her husband is a carpenter. She has another source of income which is snack vending. She bakes cakes and “puto” (a Filipino snack delicacy made of ground rice & flour) .

She got her initial capital from Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative in November 2008. The cooperative has many things to offer, like savings deposits, loans, insurance, education and training and special projects.

Today, she applies for PHP 5,000 to buy flour and ingredients for cake and “puto” making. Seeing all her children finish their studies, would be her greatest achievement.

loans.use: To buy flour and ingredients for "puto" and cake making

loans.name: Rayhonoy

texts.ru: Райхоной – молодая женщина 32 лет, замужем и мать 3-х детей. Её муж занимается купле -продажей скота на скотном рынке. А она откармливает крупнорогатый скот дома. У нее есть одна дойная корова и два быка. Конечно ей трудно смотреть сразу за 3-мя детьми и еще делать домашнюю работу, но ей приходится, чтобы хоть немного заработать деньги. Она помогает мужу в развитии его бизнеса. За счет займа они хотят увеличить количество скота и развивать свой бизнес.
texts.en:
Rayhonoy is a young woman of 32 years of age, married and is a mother of three children. Her husband is buying and reselling cattle on the cattle market and she feeds the cattle at home. She has one milk cow and two calves. Of course it is difficult for her to watch after three children at once and also do housework, but she has to do it to earn just a little bit of money. She helps her husband in the development of his business. She wants to use the loan to increase the amount of cattle and expand their business.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To expand business

loans.name: Khosiyat

texts.ru: Хосият Курбанова – женщина 55 лет. Вдова и мать 5-х детей. Имеет среднее образование. Занимается продажей мужской одежды на рынке Фаровон города Гафурова. Так как ее муж умер, она растит 5-х детей в одиночку и конечно же ей очень трудно. Хосият закупает свой товар из оптового рынка города Истаравшан.  Хосият хотела, бы расширить ассортимент своего товара, потому, что хороший ассортимент привлекает больше клиентов. Для этого она предпочла взять займ для расширения своего ассортимента.
texts.en:
Khosiyat K. is a 55 year old woman. She is a widow and the mother of 5 children. Khosiyat has a high school education. She sells men’s clothing at the Farovon market in Gafurov. Because her husband died, she is raising 5 children on her own and of course it is very difficult for her. Khosiyat purchases her products at the wholesale market in Istaravshan. She would like to expand her product assortment, because a good selection attracts more customers. She would like to take out a loan in order to expand her assortment.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase men's clothing for sale

loans.name: Sanavbar

texts.ru: Санавбар – женщина 46 лет. Замужем, имеет 4-х детей. Занимается услугой междугородней связи в 12-ом микрорайоне города Худжанда. У нее небольшое помещение, где она установила 2 телефонных аппарата. Еще она продает там карты экспресс оплаты сотовых операторов. Её муж таксист. Он тоже зарабатывает неплохо. Но все равно они хотели бы расширить свой бизнес и получать больше прибыли для того чтобы обучать своих детей в Университете.
texts.en:
Sanavbar is a 46 year old woman. She is married and has 4 children. She runs an international call center in the 12th microregion in Khujand. She has a large space where she has installed two telephones. She also sells express payment cards for cell phone service. Sanavbar’s husband is a taxi driver. His income is also not bad, but they would still like to expand their business and to increase their income in order to put their children through university.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: International phone services

loans.name: Muhayo

texts.ru: Мухайо заёмщица в Микроинвест с 2006 года.Она каждый свой займ употребляет для увеличения своего бизнеса , пошива и продажи женских одежд.Она имеет учеников по обучению моделирования и шитья платьев.В первые года она имела только одну машинку и аверлок, а сейчас её производство увеличилось втрое, у неё много клиентов.Она хочет следующий займ использовать для покупки ещё одной машинки для аверлока платьев.
texts.en:
Muhayo has been a MircoInvest borrower since 2006. She uses every loan in order to expand her business – sewing and selling women’s clothing. She has students that learn how to cut patterns and sew dresses. In the beginning, Muhayo only had one sewing machine and an overlock sewing machine, but by now her productivity has tripled and she has a lot of customers. She would like to use her next loan in order to purchase one more machine that she can use to create overlock stitches on dresses.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase an overlock sewing machine

loans.name: Sakina Group

texts.en:
My name is Sakina and I am 29 years old. I have resided in a mid-size city named Vehari, Pakistan for the past 20 years. I am an uneducated lady because my parents couldn’t pay for my education. My husband's name is M. Rafiq and he runs a garment business. I am the mother of two daughters. I want to send my daughters to school, and for this reason I sew clothes by taking orders from my neighbors and relatives.

My brother is also lives with us. He runs a fruit-selling business. He goes to different areas of Vehari on a cart and announces his products in a loud voice. He has been in this business for the past 7 years. I am applying for a loan to buy seasonal fruits to expand my brother’s fruit-selling business.

I’m the group leader of three other women from my locality. Iffat baji and Rashida baji each want a loan to buy groceries for their grocery shops. Khadija baji wants a loan to buy flowers to sell.

This is a group loan. The loan funds will be distributed among the group members, each of whom will invest in her own business. The members mutually guarantee one another's loans. If one member does not repay, the other members are responsible.

loans.use: To buy seasonal fruits to sell
